meanings: center of gravity, (수학) center of mass

vlive.korean: 꽉 차있다 - 무게감이 없지 않아요 - 무게감이... It's full. - It's heavy. - It weighs... 듣기 View video NU'EST : NU’EST 7th Mini Album ‘The Table’ D-1 UNBOXING V LIVE
vlive.english: It's full. - It's heavy. - It weighs...

vlive.english: Wouldn't it change depending on the weight?

vlive.korean: '무게를 견디는 자 왕관을 쓰라'인가? "Those who hold onto weight, wear a crown?" 듣기 View video VICTON : 연결아 ㅠㅠ
vlive.english: "Those who hold onto weight, wear a crown?"
